main event: A witness observed a bright, changing light in the sky over Fairborn, Ohio on July 25, 1961. The object remained stationary for about 20 minutes before vanishing abruptly.
interesting points: The object changed colors and size during the observation.
No sound was heard coming from the object.
The object may have been related to ball lightning, a balloon, or an aircraft, but the report lacks sufficient data for a definitive evaluation.
The witness observed the object for about 20 minutes before it disappeared suddenly.
No photographs were taken of the object.
sighted object: bright, changing light in the sky
